availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John A. Craigmyle (Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Harrison County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Enoch Craigmyle and Delilah Craigmyle. Resident of Harrison County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Harrison County in 1860. Farmer in Harrison County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 119A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Harrison County, District 2, p. 458.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Harrison County, KY, July 1863, p. 88.
"John Alexander Craigmyle (1842-1932)," Find A Grave, Memorial #43076332, accessed January 26, 2022, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/43076332.
